producer.name: metadata creator/editor name
producer.description: this is who created the metadata; should use schema.org role pattern (TBD)

encoding.description: this is about the encoding of the metadata in this metadata record (a digitalObject...).

could used one of the subclasses of schema:MediaObject, which include: 3DModel, AmpStory, AudioObject, DataDownload, ImageObject, LegislationObject, MusicVideoObject,VideoObject.  For our purposed, interpret 'DigitalDocuement' to be a match for 'DigitalObject', without all the protocol and dereference denotations associated with FDOF

identifier.description: this is redundant with @id, but makes identification of the described dataset explicit

publishingPrinciples.name: Digital Object Policy
publishingPrinciples.description: a description the editorial principles of the publisher of this digitalObject, e.g. ethics or diversity policies.
